title: Matteo Jorgenson: ‘You Need to Take That First Win to Realize You Can Do It’
content:
The American wants to mix it with Wout van Aert at the classics, help in the grand tours, and take on one-week races when he joins Jumbo-Visma in 2024.

Read the full article at Matteo Jorgenson: ‘You Need to Take That First Win to Realize You Can Do It’ on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
